title: Cambridge University Unearths Medieval Hospital Cemetery
teaser: Cambridge University has unearthed one of Britain's largest medieval hospital cemeteries, containing more than 1,000 human remains. NPR's Audie Cornish and Melissa Block talked to the leader of the dig, Craig Cessford, about the new findings.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
